title: Pingu in the City (2018) (Pingu in the City)
synopsis: Pingu continues his misadventures in the big city, now with even more different jobs for him to mess up as a result of his adorable clumsiness and affinity for mischief. Join him on his curious capers as he wreaks havoc across the city.
staff: [['Iwata, Naomi', ['Director']], ['Asai, Shingo', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Ueno, Kimiko', ['Script']], ['Tanabe, Shigenori', ['Script']]]
